eclasstool.model.drawingtools

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.Shape
      • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.Polygon

  • public abstract class Polygon
extends Shape
    Class Polygon provides methods to add a polygon with the given number of sides and position.
